name: search_grocery_products
description: Search packaged food products, such as frozen pizza or Greek yogurt.

minCarbs.description: The minimum amount of carbohydrates in grams the recipe must have per serving.

maxCarbs.description: The maximum amount of carbohydrates in grams the recipe can have per serving.

minProtein.description: The minimum amount of protein in grams the recipe must have per serving.

maxProtein.description: The maximum amount of protein in grams the recipe must have per serving.

minCalories.description: The minimum amount of calories the recipe must have per serving.

maxCalories.description: The maximum amount of calories the recipe must have per serving.

minFat.description: The minimum amount of fat in grams the recipe must have per serving.

maxFat.description: The maximum amount of fat in grams the recipe must have per serving.

number.description: The number of expected results (between 1 and 100).

addProductInformation.description: If set to true, you get more information about the products returned.

offset.description: The number of results to skip (between 0 and 990).

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: search_grocery_products_by_UPC
description: Get information about a packaged food using its UPC.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_product_information
description: Use a product id to get full information about a product, such as ingredients, nutrition, etc. The nutritional information is per serving.

id.description: The id of the packaged food.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_comparable_products
description: Use a product id to get full information about a product, such as ingredients, nutrition, etc. The nutritional information is per serving.

upc.description: The UPC of the product for which you want to find comparable products.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: autocomplete_product_search
description: Generate suggestions for grocery products based on a (partial) query. The matches will be found by looking in the title only.

number.description: The number of results to return (between 1 and 25).

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: classify_grocery_product
description: Generate suggestions for grocery products based on a (partial) query. The matches will be found by looking in the title only.

postbody.description: A json object containing the product title.

locale.description: The display name of the returned category, supported is en_US (for American English) and en_GB (for British English).

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: classify_grocery_product
description: Generate suggestions for grocery products based on a (partial) query. The matches will be found by looking in the title only.

postbody.description: A json object containing the product title.

locale.description: The display name of the returned category, supported is en_US (for American English) and en_GB (for British English).

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: classify_grocery_product_bulk
description: Provide a set of product jsons, get back classified products.

postbody.description: A json array containing objects, each with the product title.

locale.description: The display name of the returned category, supported is en_US (for American English) and en_GB (for British English).

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: map_ingredients_to_grocery_products
description: Map a set of ingredients to products you can buy in the grocery store.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
